Package system

This package contains the Core class of the system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FidelityCard
    Interface of the Fidelity Card Plans
    IDeliveryPolicy  
    ITargetProfitPolicy  
    Observable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Core
    The main class of the system and the one in charge of calling all other functions of the system as well as the users.
    DeliveryFairOccupation  
    DeliveryFastest  
    FidelityCardBasic
    This fidelity card plan has a coefficient of 1 as it doesn't apply any additional discount
    FidelityCardLottery
    This fidelity card plan has a coefficient of 1 or 0, being 0 when the user wins the lottery, which happens with a determined probability, by default 10%.
    FidelityCardPoint
    This fidelity card plan has a coefficient of 1 or 1-discount: this is determined by the discounts points that are obtained each time the customer places an order.
    Order
    The class use to create an order that has the information of the customer that ordered it and the restaurant chosen by him.
    TargetProfitDeliveryCost
    Computes the Delivery Cost value required to meet a target profit, given the Service Fee and the Markup Percentage
    TargetProfitMarkup
    Computes the Markup Percentage value required to meet a target profit, given the Service Fee and the Delivery Cost
    TargetProfitServiceFee
    Computes the Service Fee value required to meet a target profit, given the Markup Percentage and the Delivery Cost
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeliveryPolicyType  
    FidelityCardType  
    ProfitPolicyType  

Package system Description

This package contains the Core class of the system. It also contains policy related classes it implements IDeliveryPolicy interface required for Strategy pattern and delivery policy of the system classes (ie the DeliveryFairOccupation, DeliveryFastest it implements FidelityCard interface required for Strategy pattern and fidelity card of the Customer class (ie the FidelityCardBasic, FidelityCardLottery, FidelityCardPoint classes) it implements ITargetProfitPolicy interface required for Strategy pattern and target profit policy classes (ie TargetProfitDeliveryCost, TargetProfitMarkup, TargetProfitServiceFee classes) It also implements Order class required for order treatment of the system. It also implements enumerations for all policy types (ie. the DeliveryPolicyType, FidelityCardType, ProfitPolicyType classes) required for correctly reading inputs in CLUI.
Author:
Pedro León, Juan Castillo
